pageTitleSingle: Does anyone get Carer’s Allowance or the Carer’s Element of Universal Credit for looking after you?
pageTitleJoint: Does anyone get Carer’s Allowance or the Carer’s Element of Universal Credit for looking after you or your partner?

anyoneGetCarers.required: Select yes if anyone gets Carer’s Allowance for looking after you.
anyoneGetCarers.change: Change whether anyone gets Carer’s Allowance or Carer’s Element of Universal Credit for looking after you
